The Title of The Blog

Alexander
Updated-17, sept 2022

Manage the complexity of staff schedules and assess your profitability Request a demo When in 2016 we launched the first version of the Skello application, we wanted a global application aimed at managers. At the time, it had two main features. On the one hand, consultation of schedules. On the other hand, communication between employees and managers.
Six years later, things have changed. In 2021, we raised 40 million euros, tripled our headcount and opened two new markets in Spain and Germany. On the strength of these new achievements, our objective has remained the same: to simplify the lives of teams in the field.
Today we add a new layer of innovation to our app. Our vision, with an international dimension, and our efforts will now focus on creating a unique experience for the 170,000 employees who use Skello on a daily basis.

Peace of mind through technology

Yes because if Skello, it is managers who design schedules, it is also employees who receive them. These employees, who represent the heart of our users and who are the raison d'être of Skello. These are the people who use it day by day, who consult their schedules, who exchange their shifts, who make their leave requests… Today, we want to give them back the power over their schedule.
At Skello, we believe in technology in its way of bringing more serenity to work, allowing optimal collaboration and respecting everyone's schedules. Optimize the organization of their professional and personal life thanks to an accessible, fluid and pleasant tool. To gain freedom in your daily life.
When in 2016 we launched the first version of the Skello application, we wanted a global application aimed at managers. At the time, it had two main features. On the one hand, consultation of schedules. On the other hand, communication between employees and managers.
Six years later, things have changed. In 2021, we raised 40 million euros, tripled our headcount and opened two new markets in Spain and Germany. On the strength of these new achievements, our objective has remained the same: to simplify the lives of teams in the field.
Today we add a new layer of innovation to our app. Our vision, with an international dimension, and our efforts will now focus on creating a unique experience for the 170,000 employees who use Skello on a daily basis.
